thread.title: Favorite Hotel in London
thread.title_full: Favorite Hotel in London - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: michaelsA5438TW
title: Favorite Hotel in London
text: For me this is the only place to stay in London - excellent service, excellent room, excellent location...treat yourself to the St. James Court. The rooms are comfortable and spacious. The staff is very friendly and helpful. And you cannot beat being 200 meters from the Palace and Green Park.
